question_text:
Question 20 
 
  
 
 
[Database (ER Model)]
 
 
Let 
S
 be the specification: “Instructors teach courses.  Students register for courses.  Courses are allocated 
classrooms.  Instructors guide students.”  Which one of the following ER diagrams CORRECTLY 
represents 
S
 ? 
 
(i)
Registration
Instructor
Teaches
Course
Classroom
Alloca
tion
Student
Guides
(ii)
Instructor
Teaches
Course
Classroom
Alloca
Registration
tion
Guides
Projects
(iii)
(iv)

PAGE
18

(A) (i) 
(B) (ii) 
 
(C) (iii) 
(D) (iv) 
Ans. 
(D)
explanation_text:
Sol.
Instructor
Teaches
Course
Classroom
Alloca
Registration
tion
Guides
Student

Hence, the correct option is (D).
